Staff are polite and respectful. From the registration to the waiting area, medical staff and the check out. Makes you feel very welcome and comfortable. The uncle at the pantry is also very attentive and thoughtful üëçüèª
Btw, pls provide proper hair tie and not rubber bands.

Went for a routine health screening and opted for the classic package on a Wednesday morning. Entire process was smooth and efficient. Excellent customer service. Waiting for a doc review in 3 weeks time. Photo attached was the refreshment after the screening

I had a fantastic experience at Healthway Screening @ Centrepoint. From the moment I arrived, the staff was warm, welcoming, and highly professional. The check-in process was smooth, and the waiting time was minimal.

The medical team was thorough and attentive, explaining each step of the screening process clearly. They made me feel comfortable and well cared for throughout. The facilities were clean and well-maintained, adding to the overall positive experience.

I truly appreciate the efficiency and professionalism of the entire team. If you‚Äôre looking for a reliable and hassle-free health screening, I highly recommend Healthway Screening @ Centrepoint

Health screenings can be an anxious experience for many of us, but I must say my experience here was different. This was my first time having a health screening at this facility, and it was excellent. I felt well cared for‚Äîthe medical staff were highly accommodating and professional. They provided clear instructions before each procedure or test and ensured I was comfortable throughout the process. Thank you! ‚ú®‚ú®

Overall experience was great. Quiet and love the individual booth waiting area. Made me feel very calm and even blood pressure went down üòä

All the staff here are nice and attentive.  Medical staff were gentle, administrative staff were courteous and communicative and advising what‚Äôs next and recapped on the tests we have done for the day.

Big thank you to the uncle who served us water/coffee.

Will definitely recommend our friends and family üëç
